content: grace this crown invites creativity play and mythic dreaming with super bulky yarn each choice transforms the same stitches into a different archetype the rib and cables are constant but the crown you choose determines the garment s spirit invocation cast on your adventure every stitch is a step into story this hat is not only fabric it is a path a crown a choice as you knit you decide which archetype you will embody and the rib and cables will carry that spirit into form the warrior s crown short beanie option a stand firm in clarity rib converging like armor at the brow… a snug fit crisp and structured for those who walk with strength the sage s crown balanced fit option b wisdom rests in symmetry each stitch a step toward harmony… a classic taper steady and wise for those who honor balance the muse s crown slouchy spiral option c let cables spiral into dream a crown that drapes with grace and song… ©valhalla knitworks page 4 of 11 a flowing silhouette soft and feminine
